subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: In a statement released by the Redskins, Robert Kurtzke, a neurologist, said Griffin “should be held from game play this weekend and be retested in one, two weeks before a firm conclusion to return to game play can be made.”
snippet: In a statement released by the Redskins, Robert Kurtzke, a neurologist, said Griffin “should be held from game play this weekend and be retested in one, two weeks before a firm conclusion to return to game play can be made.”
